sentences.en: " Go on in! " he called. " There's no one in the compartment. "
sentences.cn: “ 进去 吧 ,里边没人. ”

sentences.en: {"COLLOINEXA":["engine compartment"]}
sentences.cn: 发动机室

sentences.en: a first-class compartment
sentences.cn: 头等舱

sentences.en: engine compartment
sentences.cn: 发动机室

sentences.en: Every compartment had some minor breakage or malfunction to report.
sentences.cn: 每间舱房总有些小毛病或机件失灵的事故上报.

sentences.en: He looked into the corridor again, but the man had entered a compartment.
sentences.cn: 他又朝过道瞄了一眼, 那人走进另一隔间去了.

sentences.en: He put it in the glove compartment with the stack of others.
sentences.cn: 他把这张停车票同一沓别的停车票都放进汽车仪表板后面的小贮藏箱里.

sentences.en: I put a bottle of champagne in the freezer compartment.
sentences.cn: 我把一瓶香槟放进冷冻室。

sentences.en: On the way home we shared our first class compartment with a group of businessmen.
sentences.cn: 回家的路上，我们和一群生意人一起坐在一等车厢。

sentences.en: She kept the money hidden in a secret compartment in her briefcase.
sentences.cn: 她把钱藏在公文包的暗层里。

sentences.en: She tried it, the secret compartment opened, and out fell four notes.
sentences.cn: 她试了一下, 秘密的夹底果然开了, 里边掉出4封信.

sentences.en: The babble of voices in the next compartment annoyed all of us.
sentences.cn: 隔壁的车厢隔间里不间歇的嘈杂谈话声让我们都很气恼.

sentences.en: The bag is divided into separate compartments .
sentences.cn: 这个包有一些独立的隔层。

sentences.en: The compartment is plenty big enough.
sentences.cn: 这个隔间足够大了。

sentences.en: The small girls and the small boy emphatically occupied the compartment.
sentences.cn: 车厢好象是这两个小姑娘和小男孩的天地.

sentences.en: They sat in a second - class compartment.
sentences.cn: 他们乘坐的是二等车厢.

sentences.en: Water in the engine compartment is sucked away by a hose.
sentences.cn: 发动机舱里的水由一条软管抽走。

sentences.en: We had the whole compartment to ourselves.
sentences.cn: 这个车厢只有我们几个人.

sentences.en: We were glad to have the whole compartment to ourselves.
sentences.cn: 真高兴,整个客车隔间由我们独享.

sentences.en: With the car in motion, air was trapped under the hood in the engine compartment.
sentences.cn: 汽车行驶时, 空气被截留在发动机舱盖下.

words.tran_cn: 区划的，分为若干部分的

phrases.tran_cn: 筋膜室综合征；间室症候群
n. （汽车仪表板上的）贮物箱

trans.tran_en: a smaller enclosed space inside something larger
